ComicInfo.Title: The Wasteland Outlaws
ComicInfo.Summary:
The best-selling Aspen series from creator Siya Oum returns!
In the epic first volume, the tough-minded Lola learned the brutal reality of the apocalypse within the confines of the ruthless Wasteland Trading Company led by the treacherous Edgar and his posse! However, the true challenge lies ahead, as her desire to be reunited with her lost parents still burns greater than ever!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Direct Market Cover A | Siya Oum | 1 | B | Direct Market Cover B | Siya Oum | 4 | C | Direct Market Cover C | Tyler Kirkham | 5 | D | Retailer Incentive Edition Cover | Siya Oum | 6 | E | Retailer Incentive Limited Edition Cover | Kenneth Rocafort | 5 | F | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 200 | Siya Oum | 2 | G | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Aspen Century Edition Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Siya Oum | 3 | H | AspenStore.com Limited Edition Sketch Cover, Limited to 200 | None | Missing | I | More Great Collectibles Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 300 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing |
